item.title: 2022 20 Aug
item.description: to do make ready the timeline theme for the daily post write readme for stoserver and upload.sh script create banner aavsyktaa hi avishkaar ki jannani h need(solution) = invention(X) Realy to do Write ML source code lab records write DBMS records write computer network assignment Python | logs python | CS50 python | api application shell readme files script for the regular update on the website save the diary file localy and then trasnfer it to the server using rsync(zip) write a script in server which execute daily and function is check for the if dir there is any notes to add or not if yes then do it (execute another fun or script ) else exit
